contentfulProduct.title: Cashmere Comb

content.value: Buy any 3 cashmere, silk, linen, supersoft, activewear, socks, jackets, alpaca sweater or ponte pant items save $5, buy any 4 and save $10

Give your premium cashmere the love it deserves with our easy-to-use cashmere comb. Remove pilling and fuzz with gentle strokes. A perfect complement for both our men's and women's cashmere collections. Made from sustainably sourced Beech wood.
Size: 2" x 4"
Material: Beech Wood
Origin: China
